alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:13PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ROBERTSON, BRACKEN, SOUTHERN CAMPBELL, PENDLETON, CLERMONT, WESTERN BROWN, EASTERN WARREN, WEST CENTRAL FAYETTE, CLINTON, SOUTHEASTERN GREENE AND WESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Xenia to 6 miles south of Falmouth, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Xenia, Wilmington, Georgetown, Blanchester, Falmouth, Amelia, Mount Orab, Bethel, New Richmond, Sabina, Williamsburg, Batavia, Lynchburg, New Vienna, Augusta, Morrow, Sardinia, Felicity, Brooksville and Butler. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 37 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Clermont; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Warren
